Verses: 1 pinbu Dhaaveedhu Isravelar Ellaarukkullum Therindhukollappatta Muppadhinaayiramperaik Kootti,

2 kerubeengalin Naduve Vaasamaayirukkira Senaigaludaiya Karththarin Naamam Thozhudhukollappadugira Dhevanudaiya Pettiyaip Paalaiyoodhaavilirundhu Konduvarumpadi, Avanum Avanodirundha Andha Sthalaththaarum Ezhundhupoi,

3 dhevanudaiya Pettiyai Oru Pudhu Radhaththinmel Etri, Adhaik Kibiyaavilirukkira Abinadhaabin Veettilirundhukonduvandhaargal; Abinadhaabin Kumaararaagiya Oosaavum Agiyovum Andhap Pudhu Radhaththai Nadaththinaargal.
4 avargal Dhevanudaiya Pettiyai Etri, Adhaik Kibiyaavilirukkira Abinadhaabin Veettilirundhu Nadaththikkondu Varugirapodhu, Agiyo Pettikku Munnaale Nadandhaan.

5 dhaaveedhum Isravel Sandhadhiyaar Anaivarum Dhevadhaaru Maraththaal Pannappatta Sagalavidha Geedhavaaththiyangalodum, Suramandalam Thamburu Melam Veenai Kaiththaalam Aagiya Ivaigalodum, Karththarukku Munbaaga Aadippaadikkonduponaargal.
6 avargal Naagonin Kalam Irukkira Idaththukku Vandhapodhu, Maadugal Mirandu Pettiyai Asaiththapadiyinaal, Oosaa Dhevanudaiya Pettiyinidamaaith Than Kaiyai Neetti, Adhaip Pidiththaan.
7 appozhudhu Karththarukku Oosaavinmel Kobamoondadhu; Avanudaiya Thunivinimiththam Dhevan Ange Avanai Adiththaar; Avan Ange Dhevanudaiya Pettiyandaiyil Seththaan.
8 appozhudhu Karththar Oosaavai Adiththadhinimiththam Dhaaveedhu Visanappattu, Andha Sthalaththirku Innaalmattum Vazhangivarugira Peresoosaa Ennum Perittaan.
9 dhaaveedhu Andraiyadhinam Karththarukku Bayandhu, Karththarudaiya Petti Ennidaththil Varuvadhu Eppadiyendru Solli,
10 adhaith Thannidaththil Dhaaveedhin Nagaraththil Konduvara Manadhillaamal, Kiththiyanaagiya Obedhedhomin Veettile Kondupoi Vaiththaan.
11 karththarudaiya Petti Kiththiyanaagiya Obedhedhomin Veettile Moondru Maadham Irukkaiyil Karththar Obedhedhomaiyum Avan Veettaar Anaivaraiyum Aaseervadhiththaar.

12 dhevanudaiya Pettiyinimiththam Karththar Obedhedhomin Veettaiyum, Avanukku Undaana Ellaavatraiyum Aaseervadhiththaar Endru Dhaaveedhuraajaavukku Arivikkappattadhu; Appozhudhu Dhaaveedhu Dhevanudaiya Pettiyai Obedhedhomin Veettilirundhu Dhaaveedhin Nagaraththukku Magizhchchiyudane Konduvandhaan.
13 karththarudaiya Pettiyai Sumandhupogiravargal Aaru Thappadi Nadandhapodhu, Maadugalaiyum Kozhuththa Aattukkadaakkalaiyum Paliyittaan.
14 dhaaveedhu Sanalnool Epoththaith Thariththukkondu, Than Muzhu Balaththodum Karththarukku Munbaaga Nadanampanninaan.
15 appadiye Dhaaveedhum, Isravel Sandhadhiyaar Anaivarum Karththarudaiya Pettiyai Gembeera Saththaththodum Ekkaala Thoniyodum Konduvandhaargal.

16 karththarudaiya Petti Dhaaveedhin Nagaraththirkul Pravesikkirapodhu, Savulin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Meegaal Palaganivazhiyaaip Paarththu, Dhaaveedhuraajaa Karththarukkumunbaagak Kudhiththu, Nadanampannugiradhaik Kandu, Than Irudhayaththile Avanai Avamadhiththaal.

17 avargal Karththarudaiya Pettiyai Ulle Konduvandhu, Adharku Dhaaveedhupotta Koodaaraththirkul Irukkira Adhin Sthaanaththile Adhai Vaiththapodhu, Dhaaveedhu Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyile Sarvaanga Thaganapaligalaiyum Samaadhaanapaligalaiyum Ittaan.
18 dhaaveedhu Sarvaanga Thaganapaligalaiyum Samaadhaanapaligalaiyum Ittapinbu, Senaigalin Karththarudaiya Naamaththinaale Janangalai Aaseervadhiththu,

19 isravelin Thiralkoottamaana Sthree Purusharaagiya Sagala Janangalukkum, Avaravarukku Ovvoru Appaththaiyum, Ovvoru Iraichchiththundaiyum, Ovvoru Padi Dhraatcharasaththaiyum Pangittaan; Pirpaadu Janangal Ellaarum Avaravar Thangal Veettirkup Poivittaargal.

20 dhaaveedhu Than Veettaarai Aaseervadhikkiradharkuth Thirumbumpodhu, Savulin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Meegaal Dhaaveedhukku Edhirkonduvandhu, Arpamanusharil Oruvan Than Vasthirangalaik Kazhatrippodugiradhupola, Indru Thammudaiya Oozhiyakkaararudaiya Pengalin Kangalukkumunbaagath Thammudaiya Vasthirangalai Urindhupottirundha Isravelin Raajaa Indru Eththanai Magimaippattirundhaar Endraal.

21 adharku Dhaaveedhu Meegaalaip Paarththu: Un Thagappanaippaarkkilum, Avarudaiya Ellaa Veettaaraippaarkkilum, Ennai Isravelaagiya Karththarudaiyajanaththinmel Thalaivanaagak Kattalaiyidumpadikkuth Therindhukonda Karththarudaiya Samugaththirku Munbaaga Aadippaadinen.
22 idhaippaarkkilum Innum Naan Neesanum En Paarvaikku Arpanumaaven; Appadiye Nee Sonna Pengalukkunkooda Magimaiyaai Vilanguven Endraan.
23 adhinaal Savulin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Meegaalukku Maranamadaiyum Naalmattum Pillai Illaadhirundhadhu.
